code: I have keys but no locks, I can be pressed but not held. What am I?
The more you take from me, the bigger I get. What am I?
I’m tall when I’m young and short when I’m old. What am I?
I can fly without wings and cry without eyes. What am I?
I’m always running but never move. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I’m full of holes but still hold water. What am I?
The more you share me, the less I become. What am I?
What has a face but no eyes, mouth, or nose?
I go up but never come down. What am I?
